name: Tortillas
steps: Put flour, baking powder, and salt in mixing bowl
Whisk dry ingredients
Add shortening to dry ingredients
Mix shortening and dry ingredients w/ hand
Once consistent, pour water in while mixing
Once consistent, move dough to unfloured spot
Knead dough ball for 10-15 minutes
Roll dough ball into 16-ish smaller balls
Put dough balls back into the bowl
Place a damp paper towel over the dough (like tucking in a child)
Let rest for 10 minutes
Take balls from bowl and use a rolling pin to partially flatten them
Simulatenously preheat pan to medium-medium-high
Once done rolling, put 2.25 tortilla sized sheet of tin foil on plate
Put two opened napkins on one half & 2 on the other half
Spread MINIMAL butter on pan to prevent burning
For each tortilla one by one:
Flatten dough so it's very thin
Place in pan
Cook on one side until it has some brownish marks
Flip to other side waiting for some small browning there too
Take off once tortilla seems done (little browning on both sides)
Place on the plate side of the tin foil / napkin setup
Once each tortilla is cooked and stacked, fold over tin
End result should look like a tin foil / napkin / tortilla sandwich
